column5: New 4br/3ba right across the street from the beach with Gulf view from the private balcony. Private 6 person hot tub in back yard. 2 master suites with king beds, 2 bedrooms with queen beds, a queen credenza bed in the living room & full click clack in the loft. 2 assigned parking spaces.
column8: 4Br/3Ba Beach View. Sleeps up to 12. Hot tub!
